alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lawrence County through 500 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Spearfish, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southeastern Spearfish around 435 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Saint Onge. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 14 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
